document_data.name: Telfir
document_data.mainbody: '''Telfir''', also known as '''Talfiric''', was a dead language in the [[Akalaic languages]] group<ref name=D:SiT-p29>{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|29}} spoken by the ancient [[Talfir]] race. It was strongly influenced by the [[Draconic language|language of dragons]].
